data.description: Provides a more in-depth examination of the issues associated with mathematics curriculum and instruction in secondary schools. A special emphasis is on curriculum choices and assessment practices.
data.title: THE TEACHING OF SECONDARY SCHOOL MATHEMATICS II

data.description: Provides an introduction to issues associated with mathematics curriculum and instruction in secondary schools. Instructional strategies, classroom management, and assessment of learning are examined in the context of current and reformed curricula.
data.title: THE TEACHING OF SECONDARY SCHOOL MATHEMATICS I
